sen.e: In 1917, a mineral deposit was found in the mountain, and then, it was mined to secure nickel, necessary for the production of weapons from 1933 to the end of the Pacific War.

sen.j: 大江山の位置する丹後地方は古くから大陸との交流が深く、渡来人は高度な金属精錬技術により大江山で金工に従事、多くの富を蓄積していた、これに目を付けた都の勢力は兵を派遣、富を収奪し支配下に置いた。
sen.e: The Tango region where Mount Oe-yama is located had close contacts with the Asian continent from ancient times, and immigrants were engaged in metal work with their advanced technique in metal refining, having accumulated a large fortune; those who recognized this in the capital sent the army, pillage the wealth, and ruled the region.

sen.j: 多分このような出来事が元になり自分達を正当化、美化しようとの思いから土蜘蛛退治や鬼退治伝説が生まれたのではないかとする説と同時に、渡来人が寄り集まって山賊化して非道な行いをしたので鬼と呼ばれたという説もある。
sen.e: One theory holds that people created the legends of tsuchigumo and ogre exterminations from these incidents in order to justify and glorify themselves; at the same time, some propose that immigrants were in fact called ogres because they gathered to become thieves and rampaged in the region.
